note: Takes a String or StringArrays and perform operations to each value returning the update value. All operations are performed on the individual strings and not the array.

params.label: Action
params.name: tc_action
params.note: The action to perform on the String or StringArray. The Strip action will strip only whitespace from the string.

params.label: Prepend Character(s)
params.name: prepend_chars
params.note: The character(s) to get prepended to the provided string(s) (e.g., **pre-**).

params.label: Starts With Character(s)
params.name: starts_with_chars
params.note: The character(s) to check for in the provided string(s) (e.g., **https**).

params.label: Starts With Start
params.name: starts_with_start
params.note: The 0-based index position at which to start the **Starts With** search. The start position can be used to skip the first *n* characters before starting the search.

params.label: Starts With Stop
params.name: starts_with_stop
params.note: The 0-based index position at which to stop the **Starts With** search. The stop position can be used to stop the search after *n* characters.
